p: The current dose under investigation is a single 200 mg loading dose, followed by 100 mg daily infusion [ 29]. Under this EUA, the recommended dosing duration for patients requiring invasive mechanical ventilation and/or ECMO, and for patients not requiring invasive mechanical ventilation and/or ECMO is 10 days and 5 days, respectively [ 28]. Therapy is not recommended in patients with an estimated glomerular filtration rate less than 30 mL/min [ 29].
